attributes.action: Mrs May must justify the UK leaving the EU on a MINORITY vote.
attributes.background:
Only 37% of the electorate (equivalent to 25% of the population) voted to leave the EU.

Acting on the wishes of a minority in a life-changing decision for our country is a GROSS INJUSTICE to the 75% MAJORITY of the British population who did not vote to leave.

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
